name: bookings
description: Information on bookings (e.g. desks, car park spaces, meeting rooms)

columns.name: id
columns.description: The internal ID of the location

columns.name: time_from
columns.description: The start date and time of the booking in the time zone of the resource

columns.name: time_to
columns.description: The end date and time of the booking in the time zone of the resource

columns.name: location_id
columns.description: The internal ID of the booked resource

columns.name: location_kind
columns.description: Indication the kind of location, typically one of BUILDING, FLOOR, ZONE, AREA, ROOM, DESK_BANK or DESK

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the booking. One of APPROVED, TENTATIVE or CANCELLED

columns.name: has_started
columns.description: Indicates whether the start time of the booking (time_from) is in the past. This does not indicate whether a booking has been 'started' (also known as checking in).

columns.name: has_ended
columns.description: Indicates whether the end time of the booking (time_to) is in the past.

columns.name: check_in_status
columns.description: Not included in API docs: Typically one of NOT_REQUIRED or CHECKED_IN

columns.name: attendee_count
columns.description: The number of attendees, including the owner if ownerIsAttendee is true.

columns.name: owner_is_attendee
columns.description: Indicates whether the booking's owner is attending the meeting.

columns.name: source
columns.description: A value representing the Matrix Booking app used to create the booking.

columns.name: version
columns.description: Version of app used to make booking

columns.name: has_external_notes
columns.description: True if there are external notes on booking

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: The id of the (internal) person to whom the booking is assigned. This person is also known as the meeting organiser.

columns.name: booked_by_id
columns.description: The id of the user who created the booking.

columns.name: organisation_id
columns.description: The ID of the host organisation. This is only applicable to customers using cross-organisation resource sharing.

columns.name: organisation_name
columns.description: The name of the host organisation. This is only applicable to customers using cross-organisation resource sharing.

columns.name: duration_milliseconds
columns.description: Duration of booking in milliseconds

columns.name: possible_actions_edit
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: edit

columns.name: possible_actions_cancel
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: cancel

columns.name: possible_actions_approve
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: approve

columns.name: possible_actions_confirm
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: confirm

columns.name: possible_actions_end_early
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: end early

columns.name: possible_actions_change_owner
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: chage owner

columns.name: possible_actions_start
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: start

columns.name: possible_actions_view_history
columns.description: Possible actions for booking: view history

columns.name: audit_created_created
columns.description: The specific history records for when the booking was created, approved, cancelled and checkedIn, as applicable to the booking. Cancelled bookings include those that required approval but were rejected.

columns.name: audit_created_when
columns.description: The specific history records for when the booking was created, approved, cancelled and checkedIn, as applicable to the booking. Cancelled bookings include those that required approval but were rejected.

columns.name: audit_created_event_type
columns.description: The specific history records for when the booking was created, approved, cancelled and checkedIn, as applicable to the booking. Cancelled bookings include those that required approval but were rejected.

columns.name: audit_created_event_user_id
columns.description: The specific history records for when the booking was created, approved, cancelled and checkedIn, as applicable to the booking. Cancelled bookings include those that required approval but were rejected.

columns.name: booking_group_id
columns.description: ID for repeat bookings

columns.name: booking_group_type
columns.description: Type of repeat bookings (e.g. REPEAT)

columns.name: booking_group_repeat_kind
columns.description: How foten to repeat (e.g. DAILY)

columns.name: booking_group_repeat_start_date
columns.description: Date and time for start of the repeat of bookings

columns.name: booking_group_repeat_end_date
columns.description: Date and time for end of the repeat of bookings

columns.name: booking_group_repeat_text
columns.description: A long text description of the type of repeat booking (e.g. 'Repeats  daily until Thu, 30 Nov 2023 (except Fri 13 Oct)')

columns.name: booking_group_status
columns.description: Current status of the repeat booking. One of APPROVED, TENTATIVE or CANCELLED

columns.name: booking_group_first_booking_status
columns.description: Current status of the first booking in the repeat booking

columns.name: status_reason
columns.description: Current status text (e.g. CANCELLED_BY_OWNER)

columns.name: audit_cancelled_created
columns.description: For cancelled events: Date and time for cancelled booking - created

columns.name: audit_cancelled_when
columns.description: For cancelled events: Date and time for cancelled booking - when (? Not clear from API doc)

columns.name: audit_cancelled_event_type
columns.description: For cancelled events: Description of cancelled event type

columns.name: audit_cancelled_event_user_id
columns.description: For cancelled events: ID of user who cancelled booking

columns.name: audit_approved_created
columns.description: For approved events: Date and time created

columns.name: audit_approved_when
columns.description: For approved events: Date and time - when (? Not clear from API docs)

columns.name: audit_approved_event_type
columns.description: For approved events: Description of approval event type

columns.name: audit_approved_event_user_id
columns.description: For approved events: ID of user who approved event

columns.name: audit_checked_in_created
columns.description: For checked in events: Date and time created

columns.name: audit_checked_in_when
columns.description: For checked in events: Date and time - when (? Not clear from API docs)

columns.name: audit_checked_in_event_type
columns.description: For checked in events: Description of checked in event type

columns.name: audit_checked_in_event_user_id
columns.description: For checked in events: ID of user who approved event

columns.name: setup_time_from
columns.description: Not clear from API docs

columns.name: setup_time_to
columns.description: Not clear from API docs

columns.name: teardown_time_from
columns.description: Not clear from API docs

columns.name: teardown_time_to
columns.description: Not clear from API docs
